item.description:
Samadhi welcomes Dustin Diperna to this month's meet up group! Many of you met Dustin at the Advanced Integral Workshop and expressed your interest in a more in depth exploration of Integral Religious Studies. Dustin will be leading a discussion focusing on:

The Conveyor Belt as proposed in Integral Spirituality. What is it? Is it legit? What might be key factors in determining the altitude of expression within a particular tradition? Examples? Teasing apart the multiple definitions of Enlightenment: What is enlightenment? Integral Enlightenment: What does it mean to be in union with a world of form that is evolving? How can we distinguish horizontal enlightenment from vertical enlightenment? What is the role of the Witness (aka. the no-self Self) in relation to peak experiences? If existence is truly non-dual, aren't we all always already enlightened?

We look forward to seeing you all soon!
item.name: Boston Ken Wilber Group September Meetup
